title: champion tab
body: we have a custom build why not a fav champion tab in champ select?

replies.body: Champion Select is already a fairly easy thing to navigate. There's even a search bar. I don't think it's necessary for a favourites tab.
i'm not saying it is hard i just think it would be a nice thing that they could add into the game, since most support and tops don't show up when you search certain roles.

It kind of minimizes the options of expanding your champion base. Every player has a champion they can fall back on but the problem with a tab for favourite champion is  that people can get tunnel vision on those  champions. It would also increase insta-locks  which is never good. Without a favourites tab, players are forced to think around what their team needs more so than what they explicitly want to play.
